text: Musa yalonda mu bantube, abasajja nsanvu, bagende mu kifo kye twamuteerawo, wabula musisi bwe yabajjira, (Musa) yagamba nti, ayi Mukama omulabirizi wange, singa kino kye wali oyagala, wandibadde wabazikiriza olubereberye wamu nange, oyagala kutuzikiriza olw'ekyo ababuyabuya mu ffe kye baakola! kino si kintu kirala kyonna okugyako okugezesakwo, obuza nakwo oyo gwoba oyagadde, ate n’olungamya nakwo, oyo gwoba oyagadde, otulinako obuyinza, n’olwekyo tusonyiwe, era otusaasire, bulijjo ggwe asinga abasaasizi bonna
